remarks: Specify the same property in two ways when class ` B ( y ) ` is single-valued.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Nov-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
statement:
eusvobj1.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
eusvobj2 $p |- ( E! x E. y e. A x = B -> ( E. y e. A x = B <-> A. y e. A x = B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
